title: Nearly 70 big cats removed from Oklahoma animal park featured in Netflix documentary
description: Nearly 70 big cats have been seized from an Oklahoma animal park owned by Jeff Lowe and his wife, Lauren, who were featured in the Netflix documentary, "Tiger King: Murder, Mayhem and Madness," a news release from the Department of Justice said Thursday.

title: The anger driving Colombia's protest movement isn't going away anytime soon
description: What started as a tax reform proposal to help ease the strain of the pandemic on the economy and balance government finances ended with people taking to the streets to express their discontent.

title: Golfer hits rare, unwanted hole-in-one -- into trash can
description: It was a rubbish tee shot, wasn't it?

title: Democrats brace for momentous decision: Will Pelosi run again?
description: After taking back the House in 2018, Nancy Pelosi called herself "a bridge to the next generation of leaders" and agreed to a deal: she'd serve again as speaker for no more than four years.

title: Here are the 63 Republicans who voted against the anti-Asian hate crimes bill
description: When the House on Wednesday overwhelmingly approved legislation intended to counter a rise in anti-Asian hate crimes amid the coronavirus pandemic, 62 GOP members voted against the measure, which was also opposed by one Republican senator when it cleared that chamber last month.

title: Former champion John Daly leads PGA Championship for brief moment
description: If only for a brief moment, John Daly was back on top.

title: Tim Cook will make first-ever court appearance in blockbuster Fortnite trial
description: Tim Cook has fielded questions from Congress about Apple's market power. Now he's about to be grilled on it for the first time in federal court.

title: Source of multiple mysterious fast radio bursts discovered
description: Scientists have traced the locations of multiple mysterious fast radio bursts back to their origins with help from the Hubble Space Telescope. The millisecond-long radio blasts came from the arms of distant spiral galaxies.

title: Police hunt man who had rocket launcher and threatened Belgium's top virologist
description: Authorities in Belgium are still hunting for a far-right extremist who had threatened one of the country's top doctors and had a rocket launcher in his car.

title: Court orders damages for hundreds of victims in breast implant scandal
description: German firm TUV Rheinland was negligent in awarding safety certificates to a French company which made faulty breast implants, a Paris court ruled, a decision advocacy groups said paved the way for thousands of women worldwide to seek damages.

title: Opinion: The Trump-Netanyahu bromance deepened American Jews' divide on Israel
description: A few weeks shy of 54 years ago, as Arab armies massed on its borders vowing extermination, Israel launched the preemptive attack that set off the Six-Day War. In that sudden transformation from looming genocide to military triumph, American Jews rallied behind the Jewish state as never before -- with unprecedented cash donations and public demonstrations.

title: Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney mocked by Welsh translator in parody video
description: Actors Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney, have released a parody video to promote their upcoming docuseries about the Welsh football club they bought earlier this year.

title: Lego unveils first LGBTQ set ahead of Pride Month
description: Lego fans can build castles, jungles and entire town centers with the right set of bricks. But from June, the company will launch a brand new product -- its first ever LGBTQ-themed set, named "Everyone Is Awesome."

title: The teenage long jump sensation with track and field in her DNA
description: Larissa Iapichino's face said it all: hands on her head and mouth agape, it was the look of someone who could scarcely believe what she had just achieved.

title: 'Holy cow': See lawmaker's stunned reaction to House vote
description: Rep. Tim Ryan (D-OH) gave an impassioned speech on the House floor after the vast majority of House Republicans voted against an independent commission to investigate the January 6 attack on the Capitol.

title: 'There is no Singapore variant,' say politicians after Indian opposition leader makes false Covid claims
description: The Singapore and Indian governments berated a senior Indian opposition politician on Wednesday for fanning a coronavirus scare between their countries, saying his comments were "irresponsible" and not based on facts.

title: Texas executes inmate for the first time in nearly a year
description: Quintin Jones was executed by lethal injection at the Texas State Penitentiary at Huntsville on Wednesday night, according to Texas Department of Criminal Justice spokesperson Jeremy Desel.

title: Top diplomats hold first high-level meeting of Biden's presidency as US-Russia tensions simmer
description: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken met with Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov on Wednesday, the first high-level encounter between the US and Russia since President Joe Biden took office, which comes amid heightened tensions between the former Cold War foes -- friction Blinken acknowledged right away.

title: Dead puppies and kittens in crates reveal the dark side of China's mystery box craze
description: In the video, the sound of scared animals is deafening.

title: Residents watch ball of fire consume their neighborhood
description: Rocket fire from Gaza and Israeli airstrikes mark the 11th day of fighting, however Hamas officials tell CNN a ceasefire is "imminent" with no word yet from Israeli officials. CNN's Ben Wedeman reports concerns of the humanitarian toll mount as calls for de-escalation grow louder.

title: See Ford's electric F-150 pickup truck
description: The most popular pickup truck in America is back, now with way more batteries. Ford revealed the fully electric F-150 Lightning at an event Wednesday night, in a moment that could herald the point at which electric vehicles go truly mainstream.

title: Infrared technology shows how a 15th-century French ruler erased his deceased wife from art history
description: It was a tragedy for Francis I of Brittany when his wife Yolande of Anjou died in 1440.  But she was soon replaced -- both as his wife and in her own prayer book, where her image and coat of arms were painted over and replaced with those of her successor.

title: Salma Hayek says she battled a near-fatal case of Covid-19
description: Salma Hayek is opening up about her battle with Covid-19.

title: NY attorney general has been looking into taxes of Trump Org CFO for months, sources say
description: The New York attorney general's office has opened a criminal tax investigation into top Trump Organization officer Allen Weisselberg, increasing the legal pressure on the long-time aide to former President Donald Trump, people familiar with the investigation say.

title: Bill faces uncertain fate in Senate as GOP resistance grows
description: • LIVE: Key things to know about today's vote
